/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the scene. The street is framed by tall buildings on either side, their facades painted in shades of white and gray, reflecting the urban architecture of the city. Cars and buses traverse the road, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static cityscape. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with a few clouds, providing a vibrant backdrop to the concrete jungle below.
